home.title: Hi, I am Pandu Wahyudi,
home.description: I'm an enthusiastic web developer always looking for new experiences. Each project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and create solutions that are both functional and enjoyable to use.

skills.title: Tools & Skills
skills.description: I specialize in using modern tools and technologies to buildefficient, high-quality web applications. With experience invarious projects, I create responsive, reliable, and user focusedsolutions, from intuitive interfaces to robust backends, ensuringoptimal performance and seamless integration.

contact.title: Lets
contact.description: Based in Indonesia, I am ready to work with you in both Indonesian and English. Do you have a great idea you'd like to bring to life? Let's start our collaboration!
